name: Thunderstorm
description: A thunderstorm with booming thunder and crackling lightning has formed overhead. Watch out, you might end up just getting a shock.
effect:
- At the end of each Round, everyone rolls 2 Chance Dice and takes 2 Electric Type damage per Success. This damage is not affected by defenses, but is affected by type effectiveness.
- Electric Type attacks ignore resistances (dealing neutral damage to ineffective targets, Electric Immunities resolve normally).
